#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		string a,b;
		int i=0,j=0,u=0;
		cin>>a;
		cin>>b;
		while(1)
		{
			if(j==b.length())
			break;
			if(a[i]==b[j])
			{
				i++;
				j++;
			}
			else
			{
				i++;
				u++;
				if(u==2)
				break;
			}	
		}
			if(u==2)
			{
				cout<<"0"<<endl;
			}
			else
			cout<<"1"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
